price: Zirikana umunsi tuzabwira umuriro wa Jahanamu tuti “Ese wuzuye?” Maze uvuge uti “Ese hari inyongera (y’abandi ngo mubampe)?”
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمۡتَلَأۡتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلۡ مِن مَّزِيدٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yawma naqūlu lijahannama hali im'talati wataqūlu hal min mazīdin
